Metadata.title: Portfolio | Benny Nobre - Full-Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Portfolio of Benny Lucas Nobre de Almeida, a Full-Stack Developer specializing in Angular, React, Next.js, Node.js, and Java.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.description:
Full-Stack Developer who loves building and understanding how things work, from the robust back-end to the interactive interface.

My journey in tech began with curiosity, which quickly evolved into a passion for programming. My desire to understand the "bigger picture" naturally led me to Full-Stack development.

Currently, I work at LAB LDI, where I collaborate on developing a highly responsive and interactive website focused on accessibility for visually impaired people. My day-to-day work is focused on Angular and Java, delivering high-quality, maintainable solutions.

In parallel, I dedicate my time to exploring and building personal projects with React, Next.js, and Node.js, always keeping up-to-date with the latest trends in the JavaScript ecosystem.

valorant-tracker.title: Valorant Tracker
valorant-tracker.description: A Valorant stats tracker featuring a performance dashboard, match history, and agent analysis.

portfolio-v1.title: Personal Portfolio v1
portfolio-v1.description: My previous personal portfolio, built to learn the fundamentals of HTML and CSS.

lab-ldi.description: I develop and maintain a website focused on accessibility, ensuring visually impaired individuals can access learning courses. My daily work involves a microservices architecture with Java and building interactive interfaces with Angular.

grupo-escalada.description: I actively participated in the development of an e-commerce site, following the SCRUM methodology. I was responsible for building reusable UI components using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and collaborated on integrating the front-end with the Node.js back-end.

dell-lead.description: AppTalk Project: I developed an innovative application to mediate interaction between users with hearing and auditory impairments. The challenge involved integrating complex libraries like MediaPipe (for AI) and Three.js (for 3D) into a React application, all orchestrated with Nest.js and RabbitMQ.

devindev.description: Developed a complete landing page for the SouElo project. I was responsible for the entire lifecycle, from setting up the environment with Docker to delivering the interface in React.js and Next.js.

unifor.role: Higher Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
unifor.description: Higher education focused on software analysis and development.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, work opportunities, or just to chat. Feel free to reach out!
